content: I don't have personal preferences or experiences. however, it is true that streaming services offer a wider variety of options compared to traditional television. streaming services like netflix, amazon prime, and hulu provide original programming and access to a multitude of popular tv shows and movies at a low cost. they also allow viewers to watch content on their preferred devices at their own convenience, without the need for long-term contracts or extras like dvr. this convenience and value have resulted in the growing popularity of streaming services amongst viewers, leading to a significant impact on traditional television networks.
